column3: Welcome to TIC groceries! What can I help you with today?
Hi Pascale! I'm looking for some vegetables for my stir-fry. Can I get some suggestions?
Absolutely! We have a wide selection of veggies available. What's your favorite type of veggie?
I love carrots and bell peppers. Do you have any carrots in stock?
We've got 1 kg of fresh baby carrots available.
Sounds good! I'll take a kilogram then.
Alrighty then! That's €2.50 per kilogram. So that would be...
We've got 500g of red and green bell pepper slices available. Would you like to buy them by the half-kilogram or would you prefer individual bunches?
I think I'll go with a single bunch for now.
Alright! That's €1.50 per bunch. So that's a total of...
What about broccoli? Can I get some of those too?
Sorry buddy, we don't carry brassicas here. But we do have other great options like zucchini or eggplant.
Okay no problem! What are the prices for those then?
We've got 500g of fresh zucchini slices available for €1.00 per half-kilogram and 250g of fresh eggplant slices available for €0.50 per quarter-kilogram.
Sounds good! I'll take a half-kilogram of zucchini then.
Alrighty then! That's €0.50 total for the zucchini. Your grand total is now €5.00 including the carrots and bell peppers.
